column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Love Tapas! The place looks small from the outside
column2: but its huge once you get in. Â We came here for Restaurant week
column3: but the R week menu was pretty lame so we just ordered off the regular menu. It was Sunday brunch
column4: and there was a Bloody Mary bar which was pretty cool. The bacon wrapped dates were my fave
column6: that orange chipotle mayo is to die for. The jamon eggs benedict was surprisingly good. I would pass on the hanger steak it had a weird after taste. We finished the meal off with some French toast with jam and goat cheese
column7: not too sweet and a great savory dessert. Overall great tapas
